sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Searches for the first occurance of one string inside another. The general syntax for its use is p = strstr(x,y) where x and y are two strings. The returned integer p indicates the index into the string x where the substring y occurs. If no instance of y is found, then p is set to zero.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: Some examples of strstr in action

para.verbatim:
--> strstr('hello','lo')
ans = 4
--> strstr('quick brown fox','own')
ans = 9
--> strstr('free stuff','lunch')
ans = 0
